'''Berserker's Timepiece''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Berserker]].

==Description==
The end inevitably comes for all, even the seemingly invincible berserker.<br />As the blood on his hands finally dried up, the berserker's footsteps began to falter.<br />His life was destined to end the moment he met his last challenge in the battlefield.<br />On the battlefield where blood flowed like rivers, his hourglass was painted red by the setting sun.
